featured.text: Most of our classmates are ________ taking a trip to Kenting National Park.

definition.zh_def: 墾丁，位於台灣南部的國家公園，以其美麗的海灘和熱帶氣候而聞名。
definition.en_def: Kenting, a national park located in southern Taiwan, known for its beautiful beaches and tropical climate.
definition.example: We spent our vacation relaxing on the beaches of Kenting.
